body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture      This page is under construction. Please check back later.Castillo San Felipe del MorroCastillo San CristóbalEl CañueloCity Walls        The Historic San Juan Gate NPS photo  At one time, approximately 3 miles of city walls surrounded and protected the city of Old San Juan. There were 5 gates. Today, the San Juan Gate is the only one remaining.
title: San Juan National Historic Site: History & Culture
